product_name: The North Face Aleutian 35 Sleeping Bag
long_description: Dial in your warmth when backpacking in mild weather with the Aleutian 35 Sleeping Bag from The North Face. It's filled with HeatseekerTM Eco insulation and can unzip flat for use as a blanket.
short_description: Dial in your warmth when backpacking in mild weather with the Aleutian 35 Sleeping Bag from The North Face. It's filled with HeatseekerTM Eco insulation and can unzip flat for use as a blanket.
